content.description: boolean expression value (2016 Fall, Quest, Question 4)

p.line: Your friend finds an abstract way to represent Boolean expressions.
It shows how the data flows from the variables A and B through the Boolean expressions and out:
If the output from the figure above is true, which can you say for _EMPHS_sure?_EMPHE_
Both A and B must be true

content.hint: Try logic truth tables if you don't understand.
